TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ClipboardProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于操控剪贴板的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使在该应用程序关闭后，持久保存项移动或复制到剪贴板。Items moved or copied to the Clipboard persist even after the application is shut down. 在剪贴板上的数据可以是任何数据格式，也称为剪贴板格式。Data on the Clipboard can be in any data format, also called a Clipboard format. 若要使用使用剪贴板的预定义格式的列表，请参阅。For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard, see . 当移动或复制到剪贴板项时，清除其他格式中的项。When an item is moved or copied to the Clipboard, items in other formats are cleared. 若要使保留其他格式，请使用，它会复制当前剪贴板，包括从其他应用程序中粘贴的项上存在的所有内容。To make other formats persist, use , which copies everything existing on the current Clipboard, including items pasted from other applications. 将数据放在以多种格式剪贴板上，若要最大化，目标应用程序，您可能不知道，它的格式要求已成功检索数据的可能性。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 由于所有 Windows 应用程序都共享系统剪贴板，切换到另一个应用程序时，可能会更改内容。Because all Windows applications share the system Clipboard, the contents may change when you switch to another application. 类必须可序列化，才能将其放到剪贴板上。A class must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 请参阅[序列化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5)有关详细信息。See [Serialization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5) for more information. 远程访问剪贴板时引发除非访问线程在 STA （单线程单元） 模式下运行。When accessing the Clipboard remotely, a is thrown unless the accessing thread operates in STA (single-threaded apartment) mode. 若要解决此问题，请设置`ThreadApartmentState`到`STA`。To resolve this issue, set the `ThreadApartmentState` to `STA`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 有关详细信息，请参阅[将数据存储到剪贴板以及从剪贴板读取](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md)。For more information, see [Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard.md). ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将文本从剪贴板读入字符串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有文本，此示例将失败。This example will fail if there is no text on the Clipboard.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除剪贴板。

span.span: Clears the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类控制对剪贴板，并显示关联的访问枚举值指示的访问级别。The class controls access to the Clipboard, and the associated enumeration value indicates the level of access. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体中的其他安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Additional Security Considerations in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms.md). ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将清除剪贴板。This example clears the Clipboard. ``` My.Computer.Clipboard.Clear() ``` 这将从剪贴板中删除所有数据。This removes all data from the Clipboard.

permission.span: 需要权限来访问系统剪贴板。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 本示例可确定剪贴板是否包含音频数据，并显示结果。This example determines whether the Clipboard contains audio data and displays the result. span.span: if data in the specified custom format is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有自定义格式的数据放置在剪贴板上，此方法可以检查剪贴板，以便该格式的数据。If you have placed custom formatted data on the Clipboard, this method allows you to check the Clipboard for data in that format. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例中的自定义格式的数据检查`specialFormat`。This example checks for data in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 替换为`specialFormat`与你想要检查的自定义格式的名称。Replace `specialFormat` with the name of the custom format you wish to check.

summary.span: 返回一个 ，该值指示剪贴板是否包含文件下拉列表。

returns.span: 如果剪贴板中存储有文件下拉列表，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a file drop list is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件放置列表是包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 本示例可确定剪贴板上是否有文件下拉列表，并将添加到列表`ListBox.lstFiles`如果它们存在。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 此代码将创建一个例外，如果没有任何`ListBox`名为`lstFiles`。This code will create an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例检查是否在剪贴板上没有图像，如果是这样，获取图像并将其添加到`PictureBox1`。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard and, if so, gets the image and adds it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此示例依赖于是否存在`PictureBox`名为`PictureBox1`。This example depends on the existence of a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例从剪贴板检索的音频流，并播放它。This example retrieves an audio stream from the Clipboard and plays it. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例读取格式数据`specialformat`从剪贴板并将其写入文件。This example reads data in the format `specialformat` from the Clipboard and writes it to file. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 替换为`specialformat`你想要检索与自定义数据格式。Replace `specialformat` with the custom data format you wish to retrieve.

summary.span: 检索剪贴板上形式为 的数据。

returns.span: 一个表示剪贴板中当前的数据的 对象；如果剪贴板中没有数据，则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the data currently on the Clipboard, or if there is no data on the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例读取从剪贴板中的窗体数据然后将它写入到文件。This example reads data from the Clipboard in the form of an and then writes it to a file. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#1)] 替换为`C:\mylogfile`与你想要写入的文件的名称。Replace `C:\mylogfile` with the name of the file to which you want to write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是仅适用于非服务器应用程序。This method is available only for non-server applications. 文件放置列表是包含文件的路径信息的字符串集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 本示例可确定剪贴板上是否有文件下拉列表，并将添加到列表`ListBox.lstFiles`如果它们存在。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 此代码创建异常，如果没有任何`ListBox`名为`lstFiles`。This code creates an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

summary.span: 检索剪贴板上的图像。

span.span: Retrieves an image from the Clipboard.

returns.span: 表示剪贴板图像数据的 ；如果剪贴板中不包含任何 格式或可转换成该格式的数据，则为 。

span.span: An representing the Clipboard image data or if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the format or can be converted to that format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 本示例先检查剪贴板中是否存在图像，然后再检索图像并将其分配给 `PictureBox1`。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard before retrieving it and assigning it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 对于此示例才能正常工作，必须有`PictureBox`名为`PictureBox1`窗体上。For this example to function correctly, there must be a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1` on your form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetText() cil managed

summary.span: 检索剪贴板上的文本。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

returns.span: 剪贴板文本数据；如果剪贴板不包含 或 格式的数据（取决于操作系统），则为空字符串。

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the or format, depending on the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式是， ，和。Possible formats are , , and . ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将文本从剪贴板读入字符串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有文本，此示例将失败。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat format) cil managed
Public Function GetText (format As TextDataFormat) As String

param.name: format
param.span: 如果指定，则标识应检索的文本格式。

span.span: If specified, identifies what text format should be retrieved.
Default is .
Required.

summary.span: 检索剪贴板上的文本。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

returns.span: 剪贴板文本数据；如果剪贴板中不包含指定格式的数据，则为空字符串。

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式是， ，和。Possible formats are , , and . ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将文本从剪贴板读入字符串`textOnClipboard`。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有文本，此示例将失败。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

summary.span: 将音频数据写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetAudio(unsigned int8[] audioBytes) cil managed

param.name: audioBytes

span.span: array.

param.span: 要写入剪贴板的音频数据。

span.span: Audio data to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.

summary.span: 将音频数据写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将创建字节数组 `musicReader`，向其中读取文件 `cool.wav`，然后将其写入剪贴板。This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 替换为`cool.wav`具有名称和你想要读取的文件的路径。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

permission.span: 需要权限来访问系统剪贴板。

span.span: permission is required to access the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将创建字节数组 `musicReader`，向其中读取文件 `cool.wav`，然后将其写入剪贴板。This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 替换为`cool.wav`具有名称和你想要读取的文件的路径。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

span.span: Format of data.
Required.

summary.span: 将自定义格式的数据写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes data in a custom format to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将以自定义格式 `specialFormat` 向剪贴板写入 `DataObject.dataChunk`。This example writes the `DataObject.dataChunk` to the Clipboard in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例依赖于自定义数据格式是否存在`specialFormat`。This example depends on the existence of the custom data format `specialFormat`.

summary.span: 将 写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes a to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级的成员;除非您单击不会显示在 IntelliSense 中**所有**选项卡。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将数据对象写入`dataChunk`到剪贴板。This example writes the data object `dataChunk` to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 此示例依赖于数据对象是否存在`dataChunk`。This example depends on the existence of the data object `dataChunk`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetFileDropList(class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection filePaths) cil managed

span.span: List of file names.
Required.

summary.span: 将表示文件路径的字符串的集合写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes a collection of strings representing file paths to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件放置列表是表示文件的名称的字符串的集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings representing file names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将获取集合中的文件名**MyDocuments**、 将其转换为文件下拉列表中，并将其写入到剪贴板。This example gets the collection of file names from **MyDocuments**, converts it to a file drop list, and writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

[!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此示例依赖于图像是否存在`coolPicture`。This example depends on the existence of the image `coolPicture`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式是， ，和。Possible formats are , , and . 不会保留以前的剪贴板格式。Previous Clipboard formats are not preserved. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将字符串写入`This is a test string.`到剪贴板。This example writes the string `This is a test string.` to the Clipboard.
